system.description: Through training and exposure, you have partially overcome your species' natural fear of confined spaces.
system.benefit: Character no longer suffers a penalty to act in Confined Spaces as a result of "But it Dark in Dere!" Trait. Additionally, they can make a -20 Willpower Test to enter a confined space of their own accord if their duties demand it. If they fail they must still be ordered to enter the space as normal.

rollConfig.description: Willpower test to enter confined space voluntarily

specialAbilities.name: Overcome Claustrophobia
specialAbilities.description: You no longer suffer penalties for "But it Dark in Dere!" trait. Make -20 Willpower test to voluntarily enter confined spaces.
